segments.text: It's almost midnight ! We are about to start a brand new year !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know it's so exciting ! A new year is always like a clean slate . Fresh start to accomplish any dreams , objectives and goals .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a New Year's resolution ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was thinking about it , but I'm never able to keep my New Year's resolution . Last year for example I joined a gym and only went twice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah I know what you mean . That's why this year I am keeping things more simple . Maybe like getting together with friends I haven't seen in a long time , or doing some volunteering work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That seems reasonable . We should get together and watch the ball drop in Times Square .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , as long as you don't try to kiss me at midnight !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we can't break tradition ! It's bad luck !
segments.speaker: S2
